title: Add complementary background and update email to hellotalentblaze@yahoo.com

requirements.summary: Add a visually appealing background throughout the website that complements the warm amber/orange color scheme and enhances professional B2B service brand aesthetic
acceptanceCriteria: Background is applied consistently across all sections (Hero, About, Services, Contact)
Background complements the existing warm amber/orange theme
Content remains clearly readable with sufficient contrast
Background enhances rather than distracts from the professional service brand presentation

file_operations.description: Add background styling using subtle gradient patterns and warm tones that complement the existing OKLCH amber/orange color system. Apply background to body element with appropriate fallback colors. Ensure sufficient contrast ratios are maintained for text readability across all theme variants.

Update the main application wrapper to ensure the background styling flows consistently across all composed sections (Hero, About, Services, Contact, Footer). Add any necessary container classes or structural adjustments to support the global background treatment.

requirements.summary: Update email contact information to hellotalentblaze@yahoo.com in ContactSection
acceptanceCriteria: Email remains properly formatted and clickable as a mailto link
Change is visible in the contact card that displays email information

file_operations.description: Update the email address displayed in the contact card from the current value to 'hellotalentblaze@yahoo.com'. Ensure the mailto link is updated accordingly and the email remains properly formatted and accessible.
